CHAT.comment: First home visit; took place in kitchen; during the first toy play CHI and Mot sat on the floor at right angles from each other; during the second toy play they sat on the floor facing each other
throughout the activity other children can be heard playing and passing through the kitchen , but their comments are not included in the transcript unless they relate to John's activities

u.a: SIS comes into room and whispers to her Mot
CHI and mother begin to dump toys
CHI and mother continue to sort toys
experimenter picks up fifty cent piece
CHI concentrates on putting people in the bus and rolling it
toy play breaks here and resumes after the interview and elicited report
refers to the planes he had played with during the interview
the mother sorts the toys while CHI plays with a plane
mother picks up a triangular block
the other children can be heard playing; CHI is building
the mother puts a block in place
<5> said in a silly low voice
mother is referring to a block that stands like a corner column
CHI has put plates on top of the corner columns
CHI begins to destroy his castle
SS has begun to knock on the outside door
the door opens and SS , Sis and friend enter
SS has jumped onto her mother's back
SS moves a chair to the refrigerator so that she can get a popsicle
makes sound of surprise and protest at being thrown on the bed in another room
mother closes door and returns to her seat

CHAT.comment: makes noises that sound like a distorted taunting laugh

u.a: functions as a sigh of relief
SS has reentered the kitchen through the bath+room
mother reseats herself on the floor
CHI and mother sort the cooking toys
CHI concentrates on the cooking game
CHI prepares or pours iced tea
CHI is referring to the pitcher top
CHI puts the top on the pitcher
CHI holds the top of the pitcher in place while pretending to pour iced tea
CHI offers a rectangular block to his mother
CHI holds a spoon toward INV1
CHI hands a spoon to INV1
CHI or his mother drops something
CHI hands a spoon to INV2
CHI fumbles with a block of fish
one section of the floor is used as a sink
CHI is busy with the dishes
CHI continues to play with dishes
<1 , 3> makes noises of pouring tea <2> sighs
CHI hands INV2 another cup of iced tea
CHI pours more tea and hands a cup to his mother
all speaks softly and gets softer
SS knocks at the door as CHI says this
the door opens with a loud creak and SS runs in
the mother takes SS into another room
SS can be heard crying and whining at times during the following song
INV1 and INV2 sing in unison
SS can be heard crying , and her mother can be heard talking to her in another room as the CHI and the experimenters talk
makes nonsense sounds almost like quacking
SS whines for Mommy during the next four turns
CHI hands a toy to an Investigator
experimenter greets Megan , an infant CHI's mother babysits
experimenter may be talking to Megan or SS
children can be heard in the background as CHI puts his toys away
experimenter refers to CHI putting away the toys
the last of the toys are picked up
the experimenter hands CHI his bubbles
Chi concentrates on untying the bow around the bubbles
